unnormalised: ## Mhojea Credit Score-acho Provas: Zero-antlean (Lagbhag) Hero
normalised: ## Mhojem Credit Score-achem Pravas: Shunyantlean (Lagim Lagim) Hero Zai Porian

unnormalised: Borem asa ixttancho, ekthaim ieo! Hanv tumkam mhoji ani mhojea credit score-achi hasyeachi kahani sangtam. Kalpan kara: Hanv, Rohan, kolejintlean bhair poddun tankam dislem poixe rukhancher ugoltai mhunn (ambea rukhancher, svabhavik asat, kiteak hanv Maharashtrantlean asa). Credit card? Fokat poixe! Karzam? Fuddarak mhoji problem! Oh, tem ajnan...
normalised: Borem asa bhau-bhoinnim, ektthaim ieiat! Hanv tumkam mhoji ani mhojea credit score-achi hanspa-sarke kotha sangtam. Kalpna korat: Hanv, Rohan, collegeantlean tazo bhair soriat, mhaka dislem poiso zhaddam voir vaddoita (ambeache zhaddam, sobayikuch, kiteak mhunnllear hanv Maharashtracho). Credit card? Fokatlo poiso! Loans? Fuddarak hanv chintt'tolo! O, kitli murkhai...

unnormalised: Mhojem poilem credit card mankyak bhorloli bazooka divpak sarkhem aslem. "EMI" mhonnchea adim hanvem tem poorn bhoren. Soglleacher kharch kellem tea mhotvachea novea phonacher (Rs. 50,000, ouch!) tea itlea biryanicher ek lhan fauj posonak puro. Ani portepovnnyo? Chol, mhojem credit score limbo kortale, udentek sumar Chennai express-chea vegaan dokxinnek veta.
normalised: Mhojem poilem credit card mhunnllear ek markaddak bhorleli bazooka divchea sarkem aslem. Hanvem tem "E-M-I" mhunnchea adimuch max out kelem. Soglleacher kharch kelo, tea nveen phoneacher (rupee pon'nas hozar, ouch!) tea biryani porian ek lhan fouzkhoryak puro teo. Ani repayments? Mhaka fattim ghetat mhunn sangtat, mhojem credit score limbo kartalem, Chennai express garmichea disanim dakxinnek voita te porian tezatlean khala voitalem.

unnormalised: Uprant aili veyktik karzam. Ek "veaparik prayatnak" ti zai asli. Thik asa, thik asa, ti khorench mhojea ixttanchim Goa-chim bhonvonddi aslem. Nyay divnaka! Anik poixe, borem asa mhunn aani bankamni darkhast keli? Tankam 3-antlean nakar dilem. ICICI ani HDFC hansem khele mhojer. Mhojem CIBIL score dayek magtale.
normalised: Uprant ailo personal loan. Eka "business venture" khatir zai aslo. Borem, borem, tem khorem mhunnllear mhojea ixttank Goa vochpacho trip khatir aslem. Judge korunk naka! Aplem nanv multiple banksanim dilem kiteak, hei, odik poiso, sornen-i? Tin bankanim mhaka add kelo. I-C-I-C-I ani H-D-F-C mhaka hansle. Mhojem C-I-B-I-L score doyek mhuntalem.

unnormalised: Thoddea vorsam uprant kattun. Povitrponnache shivay hannem mhaka zorda marlo. Achanakuch, "fuddarak-hanv" hanga aslo, rinachi dongrar polletalo. Hanvem kaim korchem poddlem! Hanvem ek credit score nigrani sevak nodh keli (Rs. 499/mahino? Mhaka mhujim astitlea vostukodde tulna keli mhunlear mhaka ek chori disli). Mhojem survatechem score? Dayalu. 500-ant kaim tori. Hanvem tea chaint dayek kaddi.
normalised: Kaim vorsam uprant katraiat. Vhoddponn mhaka zordak fattim ailem. Eka demvllek, "fuddarak hanv" itthea aslo, karzachea dongrak polloun. Mhaka kainch tori korchem poddttalem! Hanvem ek credit score monitoring service-ak nanv dilem (rupee charxim ani ekunn novad nov rupee dor mhoinea khatir? Hanv konnachi modot ghetelea tulnent uttem dislem). Mhojem survatechem score? Pathetic. Panchximchea lagim kainch tori. Hanvem mhojea chayant rodlo bhaxen distalem.

unnormalised: Vishwask korpak provem portun vata mhunn tem Diwali-ant ek ghoshit Tatkal ticket mellounk khatin aslem. Hanvem mhojim rinam bhortok suru kelem, dukhestponni, ek EMI-che vegim. Hanvem kaim povnnyo adim kelim! Hanv soputh ghetam, SBI-achem online banking portal mhojem best friend banle (ani mhojem vait dusman). Anik na uddepak dukann divpak, fokot dal-roti aahar. Sob!
normalised: Creditworthy zalo mhunn portun ieucho pravas Diwali vellar ek confirm zal'li Tatkal ticket mellchea porian kathin aslo. Hanvem mhojim karzam bhortoleak survat keli, kashttaim korun, ek E-M-I korun ek korta mhunn. Hanvem kaim payments poilim korun bhortole! Hanv sovem kartam, S-B-I-chem online banking portal mhojem ut'tom ixtt zalem (ani mhojem kharab dusman). Odik impulsiven shopping korunk nam, fakat dal-roti diet. Sob!

unnormalised: Dhireponni, dukhestponni, score chadvok suru zalam. Tem gavat vokhar korpak sarkhem aslem, punn anek utsavn aslem. Mhaka adim manyatilolo karzanchi teklifanchi emails melovpak survat zalam! Lobh, oh goad lobh! Punn hanvem virodh kela. Hee vella hanv hushar asa. Chodd korun.
normalised: Dhiren, kashttaim korun, score vaddleak survat keli. Tem tonn vaddoitolem polloup bhaxen aslem, punn odik uttejit bhaxen. Mhaka emails melle pre-approved loans diuncheak! Temptation, o dhoballeak divpi temptation! Punn hanvem dhir dhorlo. Hea vellar hanv hushar aslom. Chodd korun.

unnormalised: Atam, mhojem score 730 sumar thamba zata. Purnn nhui, punn "manya aslolea vaddechea zonn" zagaar astana. Mhaka ek borem interest rate-in ghorachi karzamcho goad gom mellovpak shakya asa. Kiteak tori. Tea andharya disanchim vicharnachem mhaka anik dhadd dhetat. Ani hanvem ek moladik xikxonk ghetlam: Credit cards fokat poixe nhui. Tim bhayank financial ninjas asat, tum chokox korun naslealear tumchea bankachem lekheacho ghat korpak toyar asat. Rohanachea murkhepantlean xika, ixttancho! Ani kiteak tori, Goa-k tomer, jito tumche score kheritponni virponn disonak.
normalised: Atam, mhojem score saatxim ani tis lagim asa. Perfect nam, punn "respectable adult" zone-ant asa mhunn sobta. Mhaka ek bore interest rate-acher ghorgheti loan-achi umallai disli bhaxen mhunn zatat. Zaite pavtt. Mhojem rokddench tea kalokachea disanchi bod'dhi ievun tras dita. Ani hanvem ek moladik xikpachem gheun asa: Credit cards free poiso non'. Te guise-an arthik ninjas, tum samball korunk naslo tor tumchea bank account-acher attak korunk toyar. Rohan-ache murkhaichea bhaxen xika, ixtta! Ani zaite pavtt, Goa-che vollok diunk bhieunk naka tumcho score khoreponnim heroic dischea porian.
